document.full_text: oakland's david dejesus picked the perfect time to get his first home runs of the season, smacking two off cleveland's previously unbeaten josh tomlin to lead the athletics to a 3-1 victory over the american league-leading indians.
document.title: dejesus homers twice as a's snap indians' streak
lines_and_colors: oakland's david dejesus picked the perfect time to get his first home runs of the season, smacking two off cleveland's previously unbeaten josh tomlin to lead the athletics to a 3-1 victory over the american league-leading indians.
